content: @T-compiler: Proposal #390 has been seconded, and will be approved in 10 days if no objections are raised.

Conversation around this happened here https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/233931-t-compiler.2Fmajor-changes/topic/Uplift.20the.20.60invalid_atomic_ordering.60.20lint.20from.20clippy

I should have time this week to get back and update that PR (but probably not until tomorrow or the day after)
